entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -42.9°C
Wind: WNW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
